data.text: @KendraIzzy @TJProvincial I really don't have time to debate logic and common sense with someone like you.  One sided reporting is wrong on so many levels - that are beyond your comprehension.  Bye!
@AmandaClark2021 @TJProvincial I’m not sure how Fred Penner choosing to not perform in places where protections are being lifted is ‘fear-mongering’ but you sure seemed to think it was.

@KendraIzzy @TJProvincial I'm not sure how referencing reports released directly from the manufacturer as a result of a court order is fear-mongering - it is encouraging people to look beyond MSM and the government - something you seem to be incapable of.
@AmandaClark2021 @TJProvincial Still hilarious to me that you complain about fear-mongering and then go on to provide your own brand of fear-mongering. The lack of self-awareness is amazing.
@TJProvincial Penner just pulled a Neil Young and canceled himself.  🤦🏼🤦🏼🤦🏼
@KendraIzzy @TJProvincial So reading beyond MSM is tinfoil hat - good to know.  I don't have time to find a picture of an ostrich with its head in the sand because that is where yours is.

@KendraIzzy @TJProvincial Simple statement of truth, maybe you should educate yourself beyond MSM before continuing to comment.  MSM has been paid off by the government of Canada using tax dollars - fully verifiable with a bit of research.  Which is why we have no unbiased reporting in Canada.
@AmandaClark2021 @TJProvincial ‘Quit with the fear-mongering… report on THIS fear-mongering instead!’

@TJProvincial Guess he won't be touring anywhere as everywhere is lifting restrictions.  Now can you quit the fear mongering reporting and report something real - like the Pfizer documents that were released showing the vaccine is not safe?
